statements: DELETE FROM Rewards WHERE reward_id = 100 AND reward_name = 'Gift Card';
DELETE FROM Rewards WHERE expiration_date < '2021-12-31' AND reward_points > 50;
DELETE FROM customer_rewards WHERE reward_points > 100 AND last_reward_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM rewards WHERE reward_id = 1 AND loyalty_id = 100;
DELETE FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 50 AND email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM customer_rewards WHERE is_claimed = false AND date_claimed < '2022-01-15';
